properties.property: select id, sqrxm, sqrxb, sqrzjzl, sqrzjhm, sqrlxfs, to_char(sqsj,'yyyy-mm-dd') sqsj, tgzmlx, tgzmnr, to_char(cbsj,'yyyy-mm-dd') cbsj, cbdwdm, cbdwmc, cbrxm, qfrxm, cljg, bz, sssqdm, sssqmc, ssjwqdm, ssjwqmc, czrxm, czrjh, czrsfzh, to_char(czsj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') czsj, czdwdm, czdwmc, djrxm, djrsfzh, to_char(djsj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') djsj, djdwdm, djdwmc, zxbs, decode(zxbs,'0','正常','1','注销','2','删除',zxbs) zxbsms, to_char(zxsj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') zxsj, to_char(scsj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') scsj from t_gzgl_tgzm where 1 = 1 and (zxbs <> '2' and zxbs <> '1') #if($jwsqdm and !$jwsqdm.equals("")) and (ssjwqdm=#[jwsqdm]) #else #if($pcsdm and !$pcsdm.equals("")) and substr(ssjwqdm,1,8)=substr(#[pcsdm],1,8) #else --精确到县区 #if($countrydm and !$countrydm.equals("")) and substr(ssjwqdm,1,6)=substr(#[countrydm],1,6) #else --精确到市州 #if($citydm and !$citydm.equals("")) and substr(ssjwqdm,1,4)=substr(#[citydm],1,4) #end #end #end #end #if($startDate && !$startDate.equals("")) and sqsj >= to_date(#[startDate]||' 00:00:00','yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') #end #if($endDate && !$endDate.equals("")) and sqsj <= to_date(#[endDate]||' 23:59:59','yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') #end #if($sqrxm && !$sqrxm.equals("")) and sqrxm like '%'||#[sqrxm]||'%' #end #if($tgzmlx && !$tgzmlx.equals("")) and tgzmlx like '%'||#[tgzmlx]||'%' #end #if($cbrxm && !$cbrxm.equals("")) and cbrxm like '%'||#[cbrxm]||'%' #end #if($cbdwmc && !$cbdwmc.equals("")) and cbdwmc like '%'||#[cbdwmc]||'%' #end #if($startTime && !$startTime.equals("")) and cbsj >= to_date(#[startTime]||' 00:00:00','yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') #end #if($endTime && !$endTime.equals("")) and cbsj <= to_date(#[endTime]||' 23:59:59','yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') #end

select id, sqrxm, sqrxb, sqrzjzl, sqrzjhm, sqrlxfs, to_char(sqsj,'yyyy-mm-dd') sqsj, tgzmlx, tgzmnr, to_char(cbsj,'yyyy-mm-dd') cbsj, cbdwdm, cbdwmc, cbrxm, qfrxm, cljg, bz, sssqdm, sssqmc, ssjwqdm, ssjwqmc, czrxm, czrjh, czrsfzh, to_char(czsj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') czsj, czdwdm, czdwmc, djrxm, djrsfzh, to_char(djsj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') djsj, djdwdm, djdwmc, zxbs, decode(zxbs,'0','正常','1','注销','2','删除',zxbs) zxbsms, to_char(zxsj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') zxsj, to_char(scsj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') scsj from t_gzgl_tgzm where id = ?

insert into t_gzgl_tgzm (id, sqrxm, sqrxb, sqrzjzl, sqrzjhm, sqrlxfs, sqsj, tgzmlx, tgzmnr, cbsj, cbdwdm, cbdwmc, cbrxm, qfrxm, cljg, bz, sssqdm, sssqmc, ssjwqdm, ssjwqmc, czrxm, czrjh, czrsfzh, czsj, czdwdm, czdwmc, djrxm, djrsfzh, djsj, djdwdm, djdwmc, zxbs) values (#[id], #[sqrxm], #[sqrxb], #[sqrzjzl], #[sqrzjhm], #[sqrlxfs], to_date(#[sqsj],'yyyy-mm-dd'), #[tgzmlx], #[tgzmnr], to_date(#[cbsj],'yyyy-mm-dd'), #[cbdwdm], #[cbdwmc], #[cbrxm], #[qfrxm], #[cljg], #[bz], #[sssqdm], #[sssqmc], #[ssjwqdm], #[ssjwqmc], #[czrxm], #[czrjh], #[czrsfzh], to_date(#[czsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #[czdwdm], #[czdwmc], #[djrxm], #[djrsfzh], to_date(#[djsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #[djdwdm], #[djdwmc], #[zxbs])

update t_gzgl_tgzm set sqrxm = #[sqrxm], sqrxb = #[sqrxb], sqrzjzl = #[sqrzjzl], sqrzjhm = #[sqrzjhm], sqrlxfs = #[sqrlxfs], sqsj = to_date(#[sqsj],'yyyy-mm-dd'), tgzmlx = #[tgzmlx], tgzmnr = #[tgzmnr], cbsj = to_date(#[cbsj],'yyyy-mm-dd'), cbdwdm = #[cbdwdm], cbdwmc = #[cbdwmc], cbrxm = #[cbrxm], qfrxm = #[qfrxm], cljg = #[cljg], bz = #[bz], ssjwqdm = #[ssjwqdm], ssjwqmc = #[ssjwqmc], czrxm = #[czrxm], czrjh = #[czrjh], czrsfzh = #[czrsfzh], czsj = to_date(#[czsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), czdwdm = #[czdwdm], czdwmc = #[czdwmc] where id = #[id]

update t_gzgl_tgzm set czrxm = #[czrxm], czrjh = #[czrjh], czrsfzh = #[czrsfzh], czsj = to_date(#[czsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), czdwdm = #[czdwdm], czdwmc = #[czdwmc], scsj = to_date(#[scsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), zxbs = #[zxbs] where id = #[id]

insert into t_gzgl_mtry (id, mtryxm, mtryxmbm, mtryxb, mtrynl, mtrycsrq, mtryzjlb, mtryzjhm, mtryjg, mtrytmtz, mtryky, mtrytbbj, mtrystzk, mtryly, mtryzwcj, mtrydnacj, mtryxx, mtryyztz, mtrysswp, mtrybfxsj, mtrybfxdd, mtrymtjg, mtrydssj, mtryjbrxm, mtrysjrxm, mtrysjrzjlb, mtrysjrzjhm, mtrysjrlxfs, mtrysjrzz, mtrybz, ssjwqdm, ssjwqmc, djsj, djrxm, djrjh, djdwdm, djdwmc, czrxm, czrjh, czsj, czdwdm, czdwmc, zxbs, scsj, mtrysg) values (#[id], #[mtryxm], #[mtryxmbm], #[mtryxb], #[mtrynl], to_date(#[mtrycsrq],'yyyy-mm-dd'), #[mtryzjlb], #[mtryzjhm], #[mtryjg], #[mtrytmtz], #[mtryky], #[mtrytbbj], #[mtrystzk], #[mtryly], #[mtryzwcj], #[mtrydnacj], #[mtryxx], #[mtryyztz], #[mtrysswp], to_date(#[mtrybfxsj],'yyyy-mm-dd'), #[mtrybfxdd], #[mtrymtjg], to_date(#[mtrydssj],'yyyy-mm-dd'), #[mtryjbrxm], #[mtrysjrxm], #[mtrysjrzjlb], #[mtrysjrzjhm], #[mtrysjrlxfs], #[mtrysjrzz], #[mtrybz], #[ssjwqdm], #[ssjwqmc], to_date(#[djsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #[djrxm], #[djrjh], #[djdwdm], #[djdwmc], #[czrxm], #[czrjh], to_date(#[czsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #[czdwdm], #[czdwmc], #[zxbs], to_date(#[scsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #[mtrysg])

select id, mtryxm, mtryxmbm, mtryxb, mtrynl, to_char(mtrycsrq,'yyyy-mm-dd') mtrycsrq, mtryzjlb, mtryzjhm, mtryjg, mtrytmtz, mtryky, mtrytbbj, mtrystzk, mtryly, mtryzwcj, mtrydnacj, mtryxx, mtryzmzp, mtryyztz, mtrysswp, to_char(mtrybfxsj,'yyyy-mm-dd') mtrybfxsj, mtrybfxdd, mtrymtjg, to_char(mtrydssj,'yyyy-mm-dd') mtrydssj, mtryjbrxm, mtrysjrxm, mtrysjrzjlb, mtrysjrzjhm, mtrysjrlxfs, mtrysjrzz, mtrybz, ssjwqdm, ssjwqmc, to_char(djsj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') djsj, djrxm, djrjh, djdwdm, djdwmc, czrxm, czrjh, to_char(czsj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') czsj, czdwdm, czdwmc, zxbs, to_char(scsj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') scsj, mtrysg from t_gzgl_mtry where 1 = 1 and (zxbs <> '2' and zxbs <> '1') #if($jwsqdm and !$jwsqdm.equals("")) and (djdwdm =#[jwsqdm]) #else #if($pcsdm and !$pcsdm.equals("")) and substr(djdwdm,1,8)=substr(#[pcsdm],1,8) #else --精确到县区 #if($countrydm and !$countrydm.equals("")) and substr(djdwdm,1,6)=substr(#[countrydm],1,6) #else --精确到市州 #if($citydm and !$citydm.equals("")) and substr(djdwdm,1,4)=substr(#[citydm],1,4) #end #end #end #end #if($fxstartDate && !$fxstartDate.equals("")) and mtrybfxsj >= to_date(#[fxstartDate]||' 00:00:00','yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') #end #if($fxendDate && !$fxendDate.equals("")) and mtrybfxsj <= to_date(#[fxendDate]||' 23:59:59','yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') #end #if($mtryxm && !$mtryxm.equals("")) and mtryxm like '%'||#[mtryxm]||'%' #end #if($mtryly && !$mtryly.equals("")) and mtryly like '%'||#[mtryly]||'%' #end #if($mtrysjrxm && !$mtrysjrxm.equals("")) and mtrysjrxm like '%'||#[mtrysjrxm]||'%' #end #if($dsstartDate && !$dsstartDate.equals("")) and mtrydssj >= to_date(#[dsstartDate]||' 00:00:00','yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') #end #if($dsendDate && !$dsendDate.equals("")) and mtrydssj <= to_date(#[dsendDate]||' 23:59:59','yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') #end

select id, mtryxm, mtryxmbm, mtryxb, mtrynl, to_char(mtrycsrq,'yyyy-mm-dd') mtrycsrq, mtryzjlb, mtryzjhm, mtryjg, mtrytmtz, mtryky, mtrytbbj, mtrystzk, mtryly, mtryzwcj, mtrydnacj, mtryxx, mtryzmzp, mtryyztz, mtrysswp, to_char(mtrybfxsj,'yyyy-mm-dd') mtrybfxsj, mtrybfxdd, mtrymtjg, to_char(mtrydssj,'yyyy-mm-dd') mtrydssj, mtryjbrxm, mtrysjrxm, mtrysjrzjlb, mtrysjrzjhm, mtrysjrlxfs, mtrysjrzz, mtrybz, ssjwqdm, ssjwqmc, to_char(djsj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') djsj, djrxm, djrjh, djdwdm, djdwmc, czrxm, czrjh, to_char(czsj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') czsj, czdwdm, czdwmc, zxbs, to_char(scsj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') scsj, mtrysg, to_char(mtrylssj,'yyyy-mm-dd') mtrylssj, mtrylsqx, mtryjsdwmc, mtryjsdwdh, mtryjsdwdz, mtryrlrxm, mtryrlrzjlb, mtryrlrzjhm, mtryrlrlxfs, mtryrlrgx, mtryrlrzz, mtryysbz, to_char(mtryysdjsj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') mtryysdjsj, mtryysdjdwdm, mtryysdjdwmc, mtryysdjrxm, mtryysdjrjh, mtryysjbrxm, mtryysssjwqdm, mtryysssjwqmc from t_gzgl_mtry where id = ?

update t_gzgl_mtry set mtryxm = #[mtryxm], mtryxmbm = #[mtryxmbm], mtryxb = #[mtryxb], mtrynl = #[mtrynl], mtrycsrq = #[mtrycsrq], mtryzjlb = #[mtryzjlb], mtryzjhm = #[mtryzjhm], mtryjg = #[mtryjg], mtrytmtz = #[mtrytmtz], mtryky = #[mtryky], mtrytbbj = #[mtrytbbj], mtrystzk = #[mtrystzk], mtryly = #[mtryly], mtryzwcj = #[mtryzwcj], mtrydnacj = #[mtrydnacj], mtryxx = #[mtryxx], mtryyztz = #[mtryyztz], mtrysswp = #[mtrysswp], mtrybfxsj = to_date(#[mtrybfxsj],'yyyy-mm-dd'), mtrybfxdd = #[mtrybfxdd], mtrymtjg = #[mtrymtjg], mtrydssj = to_date(#[mtrydssj],'yyyy-mm-dd'), mtryjbrxm = #[mtryjbrxm], mtrysjrxm = #[mtrysjrxm], mtrysjrzjlb = #[mtrysjrzjlb], mtrysjrzjhm = #[mtrysjrzjhm], mtrysjrlxfs = #[mtrysjrlxfs], mtrysjrzz = #[mtrysjrzz], mtrybz = #[mtrybz], ssjwqdm = #[ssjwqdm], ssjwqmc = #[ssjwqmc], czrxm = #[czrxm], czrjh = #[czrjh], czsj = to_date(#[czsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), czdwdm = #[czdwdm], czdwmc = #[czdwmc], mtrysg = #[mtrysg] where id = #[id]

update t_gzgl_mtry set mtrylssj = to_date(#[mtrylssj],'yyyy-mm-dd'), mtrylsqx = #[mtrylsqx], mtryjsdwmc = #[mtryjsdwmc], mtryjsdwdh = #[mtryjsdwdh], mtryjsdwdz = #[mtryjsdwdz], mtryrlrxm = #[mtryrlrxm], mtryrlrzjlb = #[mtryrlrzjlb], mtryrlrzjhm = #[mtryrlrzjhm], mtryrlrlxfs = #[mtryrlrlxfs], mtryrlrgx = #[mtryrlrgx], mtryrlrzz = #[mtryrlrzz], mtryysbz = #[mtryysbz], mtryysdjsj = to_date(#[mtryysdjsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') , mtryysdjdwdm = #[mtryysdjdwdm], mtryysdjdwmc = #[mtryysdjdwmc], mtryysdjrxm = #[mtryysdjrxm], mtryysdjrjh = #[mtryysdjrjh], mtryysjbrxm = #[mtryysjbrxm], mtryysssjwqdm = #[mtryysssjwqdm], mtryysssjwqmc = #[mtryysssjwqmc] where id = #[id]

update t_gzgl_mtry set czsj = to_date(#[czsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), czrxm = #[czrxm], czrjh = #[czrjh], czdwdm = #[czdwdm], czdwmc = #[czdwmc], scsj = to_date(#[scsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), zxbs =#[zxbs] where id = #[id]
update t_gzgl_mtry set mtryzmzp=? where id=?
update t_gzgl_mtry set mtryzmzp='' where id=?

select id, qyryxm, qyryxmbm, qyryxb, qyrynl, to_char(qyrycsrq,'yyyy-mm-dd') qyrycsrq, qyryzjlb, qyryzjhm, qyryjg, qyrytqyz, qyrytbbj, qyrystzk, qyryly, qyryzwcj, qyrydnacj, qyryxx, qyryyztz, qyrysswp, to_char(qyrybfxsj,'yyyy-mm-dd') qyrybfxsj, qyrybfxdd, qyryqyjg, to_char(qyrydssj,'yyyy-mm-dd') qyrydssj, qyryjbrxm, qyrysjrxm, qyrysjrzjlb, qyrysjrzjhm, qyrysjrlxfs, qyrysjrzz, qyrybz, ssjwqdm, ssjwqmc, to_char(djsj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') djsj, djrxm, djrjh, djdwdm, djdwmc, czrxm, czrjh, to_char(czsj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') czsj, czdwdm, czdwmc, zxbs, to_char(scsj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') scsj, qyryfxrxm, qyryfxrsfzh, qyryfxrzjlb, qyryfxrzjhm, qyryfxrzz, qyryfxrlxfs from t_gzgl_qyry where 1 = 1 and (zxbs <> '2' and zxbs <> '1') #if($jwsqdm and !$jwsqdm.equals("")) and (djdwdm =#[jwsqdm]) #else #if($pcsdm and !$pcsdm.equals("")) and substr(djdwdm,1,8)=substr(#[pcsdm],1,8) #else --精确到县区 #if($countrydm and !$countrydm.equals("")) and substr(djdwdm,1,6)=substr(#[countrydm],1,6) #else --精确到市州 #if($citydm and !$citydm.equals("")) and substr(djdwdm,1,4)=substr(#[citydm],1,4) #end #end #end #end #if($fxstartDate && !$fxstartDate.equals("")) and qyrybfxsj >= to_date(#[fxstartDate]||' 00:00:00','yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') #end #if($fxendDate && !$fxendDate.equals("")) and qyrybfxsj <= to_date(#[fxendDate]||' 23:59:59','yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') #end #if($qyryxm && !$qyryxm.equals("")) and qyryxm like '%'||#[qyryxm]||'%' #end #if($qyryly && !$qyryly.equals("")) and qyryly like '%'||#[qyryly]||'%' #end #if($qyryfxrxm && !$qyryfxrxm.equals("")) and qyryfxrxm like '%'||#[qyryfxrxm]||'%' #end #if($dsstartDate && !$dsstartDate.equals("")) and qyrydssj >= to_date(#[dsstartDate]||' 00:00:00','yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') #end #if($dsendDate && !$dsendDate.equals("")) and qyrydssj <= to_date(#[dsendDate]||' 23:59:59','yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') #end

select id, qyryxm, qyryxmbm, qyryxb, qyrynl, to_char(qyrycsrq,'yyyy-mm-dd') qyrycsrq, qyryzjlb, qyryzjhm, qyryjg, qyrytqyz, qyrytbbj, qyrystzk, qyryly, qyryzwcj, qyrydnacj, qyryxx, qyryyztz, qyrysswp, to_char(qyrybfxsj,'yyyy-mm-dd') qyrybfxsj, qyrybfxdd, qyryqyjg, to_char(qyrydssj,'yyyy-mm-dd') qyrydssj, qyryjbrxm, qyrysjrxm, qyrysjrzjlb, qyrysjrzjhm, qyrysjrlxfs, qyrysjrzz, qyrybz, ssjwqdm, ssjwqmc, to_char(djsj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') djsj, djrxm, djrjh, djdwdm, djdwmc, czrxm, czrjh, to_char(czsj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') czsj, czdwdm, czdwmc, zxbs, to_char(scsj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') scsj, qyryfxrxm, qyryfxrsfzh, qyryfxrzjlb, qyryfxrzjhm, qyryfxrzz, qyryfxrlxfs, to_char(qyrylssj,'yyyy-mm-dd') qyrylssj, qyrylsqx, qyryjsdwmc, qyryjsdwdh, qyryjsdwdz, qyryrlrxm, qyryrlrsfzh, qyryrlrzjlb, qyryrlrzjhm, qyryrlrlxfs, qyryyrlrgx, qyryrlrzz, qyryysjbrxm, qyryyssprxm, qyryysbz, qyysssjwqdm, qyysssjwqmc, qyysdjrxm, to_char(qyysdjsj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') qyysdjsj, qyysdjdwdm, qyysdjdwmc from t_gzgl_qyry where id = ?
update t_gzgl_qyry set qyryzmzp='' where id=?

insert into t_gzgl_qyry (id, qyryxm, qyryxmbm, qyryxb, qyrynl, qyrycsrq, qyryzjlb, qyryzjhm, qyryjg, qyrytqyz, qyrytbbj, qyrystzk, qyryly, qyryzwcj, qyrydnacj, qyryxx, qyryyztz, qyrysswp, qyrybfxsj, qyrybfxdd, qyryqyjg, qyrydssj, qyryjbrxm, qyrysjrxm, qyrysjrzjlb, qyrysjrzjhm, qyrysjrlxfs, qyrysjrzz, qyrybz, ssjwqdm, ssjwqmc, djsj, djrxm, djrjh, djdwdm, djdwmc, czrxm, czrjh, czsj, czdwdm, czdwmc, zxbs, scsj, qyryfxrxm, qyryfxrsfzh, qyryfxrzjlb, qyryfxrzjhm, qyryfxrzz, qyryfxrlxfs) values (#[id], #[qyryxm], #[qyryxmbm], #[qyryxb], #[qyrynl], to_date(#[qyrycsrq],'yyyy-mm-dd'), #[qyryzjlb], #[qyryzjhm], #[qyryjg], #[qyrytqyz], #[qyrytbbj], #[qyrystzk], #[qyryly], #[qyryzwcj], #[qyrydnacj], #[qyryxx], #[qyryyztz], #[qyrysswp], to_date(#[qyrybfxsj],'yyyy-mm-dd'), #[qyrybfxdd], #[qyryqyjg], to_date(#[qyrydssj],'yyyy-mm-dd'), #[qyryjbrxm], #[qyrysjrxm], #[qyrysjrzjlb], #[qyrysjrzjhm], #[qyrysjrlxfs], #[qyrysjrzz], #[qyrybz], #[ssjwqdm], #[ssjwqmc], to_date(#[djsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #[djrxm], #[djrjh], #[djdwdm], #[djdwmc], #[czrxm], #[czrjh], to_date(#[czsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #[czdwdm], #[czdwmc], #[zxbs], to_date(#[scsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #[qyryfxrxm], #[qyryfxrsfzh], #[qyryfxrzjlb], #[qyryfxrzjhm], #[qyryfxrzz], #[qyryfxrlxfs])

update t_gzgl_qyry set qyryxm = #[qyryxm], qyryxmbm = #[qyryxmbm], qyryxb = #[qyryxb], qyrynl = #[qyrynl], qyrycsrq = to_date(#[qyrycsrq],'yyyy-mm-dd'), qyryzjlb = #[qyryzjlb], qyryzjhm = #[qyryzjhm], qyryjg = #[qyryjg], qyrytqyz = #[qyrytqyz], qyrytbbj = #[qyrytbbj], qyrystzk = #[qyrystzk], qyryly = #[qyryly], qyryzwcj = #[qyryzwcj], qyrydnacj = #[qyrydnacj], qyryxx = #[qyryxx], qyryyztz = #[qyryyztz], qyrysswp = #[qyrysswp], qyrybfxsj = to_date(#[qyrybfxsj],'yyyy-mm-dd'), qyrybfxdd = #[qyrybfxdd], qyryqyjg = #[qyryqyjg], qyrydssj = to_date(#[qyrydssj],'yyyy-mm-dd'), qyryjbrxm = #[qyryjbrxm], qyrysjrxm = #[qyrysjrxm], qyrysjrzjlb = #[qyrysjrzjlb], qyrysjrzjhm = #[qyrysjrzjhm], qyrysjrlxfs = #[qyrysjrlxfs], qyrysjrzz = #[qyrysjrzz], qyrybz = #[qyrybz], ssjwqdm = #[ssjwqdm], ssjwqmc = #[ssjwqmc], czrxm = #[czrxm], czrjh = #[czrjh], czsj = to_date(#[czsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), czdwdm = #[czdwdm], czdwmc = #[czdwmc], qyryfxrxm = #[qyryfxrxm], qyryfxrsfzh = #[qyryfxrsfzh], qyryfxrzjlb = #[qyryfxrzjlb], qyryfxrzjhm = #[qyryfxrzjhm], qyryfxrzz = #[qyryfxrzz], qyryfxrlxfs = #[qyryfxrlxfs] where id =#[id]

update t_gzgl_qyry set czsj = to_date(#[czsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), czrxm = #[czrxm], czrjh = #[czrjh], czdwdm = #[czdwdm], czdwmc = #[czdwmc], scsj = to_date(#[scsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), zxbs =#[zxbs] where id = #[id]

update t_gzgl_qyry set qyrylssj = to_date(#[qyrylssj],'yyyy-mm-dd'), qyrylsqx = #[qyrylsqx], qyryjsdwmc = #[qyryjsdwmc], qyryjsdwdh = #[qyryjsdwdh], qyryjsdwdz = #[qyryjsdwdz], qyryrlrxm = #[qyryrlrxm], qyryrlrsfzh = #[qyryrlrsfzh], qyryrlrzjlb = #[qyryrlrzjlb], qyryrlrzjhm = #[qyryrlrzjhm], qyryrlrlxfs = #[qyryrlrlxfs], qyryyrlrgx = #[qyryyrlrgx], qyryrlrzz = #[qyryrlrzz], qyryysjbrxm = #[qyryysjbrxm], qyryyssprxm = #[qyryyssprxm], qyryysbz = #[qyryysbz], qyysssjwqdm = #[qyysssjwqdm], qyysssjwqmc = #[qyysssjwqmc], qyysdjrxm = #[qyysdjrxm], qyysdjsj = to_date(#[qyysdjsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), qyysdjdwdm = #[qyysdjdwdm], qyysdjdwmc = #[qyysdjdwmc] where id = #[id]

select id, qtrylb, qtryxm, qtrycym, qtryxb, qtrynl, qtryjg, qtrymz, qtrywhcd, qtryjkzk, to_char(qtrybfxsj,'yyyy-mm-dd') qtrybfxsj, qtrybfxdd, qtryhjxz, qtrycw, qtryzp, qtryjsrxm, qtryjssj, qtryjsdwmc, qtryjsdwld, qtrybz, ssjwqdm, ssjwqmc, djrxm, djrjh, djsj, djdwdm, djdwmc, czrxm, czrjh, czsj, czdwdm, czdwmc, zxbs, scsj, sydwyj, sysj, szyy, zyh, ryqk, syryxm, jsysxm, rysj, jzzshyj, jzzshrxm, jzzshsj, cyqkclyj, ylfy, zzysxm, yssj, yscbrxm, jsrxm, jssj, jsdwmc, jsdwld, ysxxbz, ysdjsj, ysdjrxm, ysdjdwdm, ysdjdwmc from t_gzgl_qtry where 1 = 1 and (zxbs <> '2' and zxbs <> '1') #if($jwsqdm and !$jwsqdm.equals("")) and (djdwdm =#[jwsqdm]) #else #if($pcsdm and !$pcsdm.equals("")) and substr(djdwdm,1,8)=substr(#[pcsdm],1,8) #else --精确到县区 #if($countrydm and !$countrydm.equals("")) and substr(djdwdm,1,6)=substr(#[countrydm],1,6) #else --精确到市州 #if($citydm and !$citydm.equals("")) and substr(djdwdm,1,4)=substr(#[citydm],1,4) #end #end #end #end #if($startbfxsj && !$startbfxsj.equals("")) and qtrybfxsj >= to_date(#[startbfxsj]||' 00:00:00','yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') #end #if($endbfxsj && !$endbfxsj.equals("")) and qtrybfxsj <= to_date(#[endbfxsj]||' 23:59:59','yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') #end #if($qtryxm && !$qtryxm.equals("")) and qtryxm like '%'||#[qtryxm]||'%' #end #if($qtrylb && !$qtrylb.equals("")) and qtrylb = #[qtrylb] #end #if($qtryxb && !$qtryxb.equals("")) and qtryxb = #[qtryxb] #end #if($qtryjg && !$qtryjg.equals("")) and qtryjg like #[qtryjg]||'%' #end #if($qtrybfxdd && !$qtrybfxdd.equals("")) and qtrybfxdd like '%'||#[qtrybfxdd]||'%' #end

select id, qtrylb, qtryxm, qtrycym, qtryxb, qtrynl, qtryjg, qtrymz, qtrywhcd, qtryjkzk, to_char(qtrybfxsj,'yyyy-mm-dd') qtrybfxsj, qtrybfxdd, qtryhjxz, qtrycw, qtryzp, qtryjsrxm, to_char(qtryjssj,'yyyy-mm-dd') qtryjssj, qtryjsdwmc, qtryjsdwld, qtrybz, ssjwqdm, ssjwqmc, djrxm, djrjh, to_char(djsj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') djsj, djdwdm, djdwmc, czrxm, czrjh, to_char(czsj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') czsj, czdwdm, czdwmc, zxbs, scsj, sydwyj, to_char(sysj,'yyyy-mm-dd') sysj, szyy, zyh, ryqk, syryxm, jsysxm, to_char(rysj,'yyyy-mm-dd') rysj, jzzshyj, jzzshrxm, to_char(jzzshsj,'yyyy-mm-dd') jzzshsj, cyqkclyj, ylfy, zzysxm, to_char(yssj,'yyyy-mm-dd') yssj, yscbrxm, jsrxm, to_char(jssj,'yyyy-mm-dd') jssj, jsdwmc, jsdwld, ysxxbz, to_char(ysdjsj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') ysdjsj, ysdjrxm, ysdjdwdm, ysdjdwmc from t_gzgl_qtry where id = ?
select id, jtpyxm, jtpylxdh, jtpygx, djsj, djrxm, djrjh, djdwdm, djdwmc, czrxm, czrjh, czsj, czdwdm, czdwmc, zxbs, scsj, qtryid from t_gzgl_qtrypy where qtryid = #[qtryid]

insert into t_gzgl_qtry (id, qtrylb, qtryxm, qtrycym, qtryxb, qtrynl, qtryjg, qtrymz, qtrywhcd, qtryjkzk, qtrybfxsj, qtrybfxdd, qtryhjxz, qtrycw, qtryjsrxm, qtryjssj, qtryjsdwmc, qtryjsdwld, qtrybz, ssjwqdm, ssjwqmc, djrxm, djrjh, djsj, djdwdm, djdwmc, czrxm, czrjh, czsj, czdwdm, czdwmc, zxbs) values (#[id], #[qtrylb], #[qtryxm], #[qtrycym], #[qtryxb], #[qtrynl], #[qtryjg], #[qtrymz], #[qtrywhcd], #[qtryjkzk], to_date(#[qtrybfxsj],'yyyy-mm-dd'), #[qtrybfxdd], #[qtryhjxz], #[qtrycw], #[qtryjsrxm], to_date(#[qtryjssj],'yyyy-mm-dd'), #[qtryjsdwmc], #[qtryjsdwld], #[qtrybz], #[ssjwqdm], #[ssjwqmc], #[djrxm], #[djrjh], to_date(#[djsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #[djdwdm], #[djdwmc], #[czrxm], #[czrjh], to_date(#[czsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #[czdwdm], #[czdwmc], #[zxbs])

update t_gzgl_qtry set qtrylb = #[qtrylb], qtryxm = #[qtryxm], qtrycym = #[qtrycym], qtryxb = #[qtryxb], qtrynl = #[qtrynl], qtryjg = #[qtryjg], qtrymz = #[qtrymz], qtrywhcd = #[qtrywhcd], qtryjkzk = #[qtryjkzk], qtrybfxsj = to_date(#[qtrybfxsj],'yyyy-mm-dd'), qtrybfxdd = #[qtrybfxdd], qtryhjxz = #[qtryhjxz], qtrycw = #[qtrycw], qtryjsrxm = #[qtryjsrxm], qtryjssj = to_date(#[qtryjssj],'yyyy-mm-dd'), qtryjsdwmc = #[qtryjsdwmc], qtryjsdwld = #[qtryjsdwld], qtrybz = #[qtrybz], ssjwqdm = #[ssjwqdm], ssjwqmc = #[ssjwqmc], czrxm = #[czrxm], czrjh = #[czrjh], czsj = to_date(#[czsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), czdwdm = #[czdwdm], czdwmc = #[czdwmc] where id= #[id]

update t_gzgl_qtry set czrxm = #[czrxm], czrjh = #[czrjh], czsj = to_date(#[czsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), czdwdm = #[czdwdm], czdwmc = #[czdwmc], zxbs = #[zxbs], scsj = to_date(#[scsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') where id =#[id]
update t_gzgl_qtry set qtryzp='' where id=?

insert into t_gzgl_qtrypy (id, jtpyxm, jtpylxdh, jtpygx, djsj, djrxm, djrjh, djdwdm, djdwmc, czrxm, czrjh, czsj, czdwdm, czdwmc, zxbs, qtryid) values (#[id], #[jtpyxm], #[jtpylxdh], #[jtpygx], to_date(#[djsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #[djrxm], #[djrjh], #[djdwdm], #[djdwmc], #[czrxm], #[czrjh], to_date(#[czsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #[czdwdm], #[czdwmc], #[zxbs], #[qtryid])

update t_gzgl_qtry set sydwyj = #[sydwyj], sysj = to_date(#[sysj],'yyyy-mm-dd'), szyy = #[szyy], zyh = #[zyh], ryqk = #[ryqk], syryxm = #[syryxm], jsysxm = #[jsysxm], rysj = to_date(#[rysj],'yyyy-mm-dd'), jzzshyj = #[jzzshyj], jzzshrxm = #[jzzshrxm], jzzshsj = to_date(#[jzzshsj],'yyyy-mm-dd'), cyqkclyj = #[cyqkclyj], ylfy = #[ylfy], zzysxm = #[zzysxm], yssj = to_date(#[yssj],'yyyy-mm-dd'), yscbrxm = #[yscbrxm], jsrxm = #[jsrxm], jssj = to_date(#[jssj],'yyyy-mm-dd'), jsdwmc = #[jsdwmc], jsdwld = #[jsdwld], ysxxbz = #[ysxxbz], ysdjsj = to_date(#[ysdjsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), ysdjrxm = #[ysdjrxm], ysdjdwdm = #[ysdjdwdm], ysdjdwmc = #[ysdjdwmc] where id =#[id]

select id, to_char(fwsj,'yyyy-mm-dd') fwsj, fwnr, bz, ssjwqdm, ssjwqmc, jbrxm, to_char(djsj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') djsj, djrxm, djrjh, djdwdm, djdwmc, czrxm, to_char(czsj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') czsj, czdwdm, czdwmc, czrjh, zxbs, to_char(scsj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') scsj from t_gzgl_qtfw where 1 = 1 and (zxbs <> '2' and zxbs <> '1') #if($jwsqdm and !$jwsqdm.equals("")) and (djdwdm =#[jwsqdm]) #else #if($pcsdm and !$pcsdm.equals("")) and substr(djdwdm,1,8)=substr(#[pcsdm],1,8) #else --精确到县区 #if($countrydm and !$countrydm.equals("")) and substr(djdwdm,1,6)=substr(#[countrydm],1,6) #else --精确到市州 #if($citydm and !$citydm.equals("")) and substr(djdwdm,1,4)=substr(#[citydm],1,4) #end #end #end #end #if($startfwsj && !$startfwsj.equals("")) and fwsj >= to_date(#[startfwsj]||' 00:00:00','yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') #end #if($endfwsj && !$endfwsj.equals("")) and fwsj <= to_date(#[endfwsj]||' 23:59:59','yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') #end #if($jbrxm && !$jbrxm.equals("")) and jbrxm like '%'||#[jbrxm]||'%' #end #if($fwnr && !$fwnr.equals("")) and fwnr like '%'||#[fwnr]||'%' #end

select id, to_char(fwsj,'yyyy-mm-dd') fwsj, fwnr, bz, ssjwqdm, ssjwqmc, jbrxm, to_char(djsj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') djsj, djrxm, djrjh, djdwdm, djdwmc, czrxm, to_char(czsj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') czsj, czdwdm, czdwmc, czrjh, zxbs, to_char(scsj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') scsj from t_gzgl_qtfw where id = ?

insert into t_gzgl_qtfw (id, fwsj, fwnr, bz, ssjwqdm, ssjwqmc, jbrxm, djsj, djrxm, djrjh, djdwdm, djdwmc, czrxm, czsj, czdwdm, czdwmc, czrjh, zxbs) values (#[id], to_date(#[fwsj],'yyyy-mm-dd'), #[fwnr], #[bz], #[ssjwqdm], #[ssjwqmc], #[jbrxm], to_date(#[djsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #[djrxm], #[djrjh], #[djdwdm], #[djdwmc], #[czrxm], to_date(#[czsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #[czdwdm], #[czdwmc], #[czrjh], #[zxbs])

update t_gzgl_qtfw set fwsj = to_date(#[fwsj],'yyyy-mm-dd'), fwnr = #[fwnr], bz = #[bz], ssjwqdm = #[ssjwqdm], ssjwqmc = #[ssjwqmc], jbrxm = #[jbrxm], czrxm = #[czrxm], czsj = to_date(#[czsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), czdwdm = #[czdwdm], czdwmc = #[czdwmc], czrjh = #[czrjh] where id = #[id]

update t_gzgl_qtfw set czrxm = #[czrxm], czsj = to_date(#[czsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), czdwdm = #[czdwdm], czdwmc = #[czdwmc], czrjh = #[czrjh], zxbs = #[zxbs], scsj = to_date(#[scsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') where id = #[id]

insert into t_tjfx_zapctb (id, hja, lljf, zdcq, tqgz, fzcsw, sfss, qtyy, mjpcfx, hlwjh, dhjb, qzjb, hjb, qsydw, dzjg, xx, jccz, gc, jj, qtbw, bzwp, qz, qy, jd, dj, qtgj, yjqtjz, hjc, esyx, eszss, syzws, ssyys, wyry, wlwgry, sfry, jsbr, qtrq, zacf, xscf, rcwk, sjzy, lg, jdhxp, qzb, zdb, qyb, djdwdm, djdwmc, parentcode, parentname, leve, tjyf, tjqsrq, tjjzrq, tbsj, djrjh, djrxm, djrsfzh, ip) values (#[id], #[hja], #[lljf], #[zdcq], #[tqgz], #[fzcsw], #[sfss], #[qtyy], #[mjpcfx], #[hlwjh], #[dhjb], #[qzjb], #[hjb], #[qsydw], #[dzjg], #[xx], #[jccz], #[gc], #[jj], #[qtbw], #[bzwp], #[qz], #[qy], #[jd], #[dj], #[qtgj], #[yjqtjz], #[hjc], #[esyx], #[eszss], #[syzws], #[ssyys], #[wyry], #[wlwgry], #[sfry], #[jsbr], #[qtrq], #[zacf], #[xscf], #[rcwk], #[sjzy], #[lg], #[jdhxp], #[qzb], #[zdb], #[qyb], #[djdwdm], #[djdwmc], #[parentcode], #[parentname], #[leve], #[tjyf], #[tjqsrq], #[tjjzrq], to_date(#[tbsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #[djrjh], #[djrxm], #[djrsfzh], #[ip])

update t_tjfx_zapctb set hja = #[hja], lljf = #[lljf], zdcq = #[zdcq], tqgz = #[tqgz], fzcsw = #[fzcsw], sfss = #[sfss], qtyy = #[qtyy], mjpcfx = #[mjpcfx], hlwjh = #[hlwjh], dhjb = #[dhjb], qzjb = #[qzjb], hjb = #[hjb], qsydw = #[qsydw], dzjg = #[dzjg], xx = #[xx], jccz = #[jccz], gc = #[gc], jj = #[jj], qtbw = #[qtbw], bzwp = #[bzwp], qz = #[qz], qy = #[qy], jd = #[jd], dj = #[dj], qtgj = #[qtgj], yjqtjz = #[yjqtjz], hjc = #[hjc], esyx = #[esyx], eszss = #[eszss], syzws = #[syzws], ssyys = #[ssyys], wyry = #[wyry], wlwgry = #[wlwgry], sfry = #[sfry], jsbr = #[jsbr], qtrq = #[qtrq], zacf = #[zacf], xscf = #[xscf], rcwk = #[rcwk], sjzy = #[sjzy], lg = #[lg], jdhxp = #[jdhxp], qzb = #[qzb], zdb = #[zdb], qyb = #[qyb], ip = #[ip] where id = #[id]

select id, hja, lljf, zdcq, tqgz, fzcsw, sfss, qtyy, mjpcfx, hlwjh, dhjb, qzjb, hjb, qsydw, dzjg, xx, jccz, gc, jj, qtbw, bzwp, qz, qy, jd, dj, qtgj, yjqtjz, hjc, esyx, eszss, syzws, ssyys, wyry, wlwgry, sfry, jsbr, qtrq, zacf, xscf, rcwk, nvl(sjzy,'0') sjzy, nvl(lg,'0') lg, nvl(jdhxp,'0') jdhxp, nvl(qzb,'0') qzb, nvl(zdb,'0') zdb, nvl(qyb,'0') qyb, djdwdm, djdwmc, parentcode, parentname, leve, tjyf, tjqsrq, tjjzrq, tbsj, djrjh, djrxm, djrsfzh, ip from t_tjfx_zapctb where djdwdm =#[djdwdm] and tjyf = #[tjyf]

select sum(hja) hja, sum(lljf) lljf, sum(zdcq) zdcq, sum(tqgz) tqgz, sum(fzcsw) fzcsw, sum(sfss) sfss, sum(qtyy) qtyy, sum(mjpcfx) mjpcfx, sum(hlwjh) hlwjh, sum(dhjb) dhjb, sum(qzjb) qzjb, sum(hjb) hjb, sum(qsydw) qsydw, sum(dzjg) dzjg, sum(xx) xx, sum(jccz) jccz, sum(gc) gc, sum(jj) jj, sum(qtbw) qtbw, sum(bzwp) bzwp, sum(qz) qz, sum(qy) qy, sum(jd) jd, sum(dj) dj, sum(qtgj) qtgj, sum(yjqtjz) yjqtjz, sum(hjc) hjc, sum(esyx) esyx, sum(eszss) eszss, sum(syzws) syzws, sum(ssyys) ssyys, sum(wyry) wyry, sum(wlwgry) wlwgry, sum(sfry) sfry, sum(jsbr) jsbr, sum(qtrq) qtrq, sum(zacf) zacf, sum(xscf) xscf, sum(rcwk) rcwk, sum(nvl(sjzy, '0')) sjzy, sum(nvl(lg, '0')) lg, sum(nvl(jdhxp, '0')) jdhxp, sum(nvl(qzb, '0')) qzb, sum(nvl(zdb, '0')) zdb, sum(nvl(qyb, '0')) qyb from t_tjfx_zapctb t where 1=1 and t.tjyf = #[tjyf] and t.djdwdm like case when F_GET_DWLEVE(#[djdwdm]) = '1' then substr(#[djdwdm], 1, 2) || '%' when F_GET_DWLEVE(#[djdwdm]) = '2' then substr(#[djdwdm], 1, 4) || '%' when F_GET_DWLEVE(#[djdwdm]) = '3' then substr(#[djdwdm], 1, 6) || '%' when F_GET_DWLEVE(#[djdwdm]) = '4' then substr(#[djdwdm], 1, 8) || '%' when F_GET_DWLEVE(#[djdwdm]) = '5' then substr(#[djdwdm], 1, 12) || '%' else substr(#[djdwdm], 1, 12) || '%' end

select sum(hja) hja, sum(lljf) lljf, sum(zdcq) zdcq, sum(tqgz) tqgz, sum(fzcsw) fzcsw, sum(sfss) sfss, sum(qtyy) qtyy, sum(mjpcfx) mjpcfx, sum(hlwjh) hlwjh, sum(dhjb) dhjb, sum(qzjb) qzjb, sum(hjb) hjb, sum(qsydw) qsydw, sum(dzjg) dzjg, sum(xx) xx, sum(jccz) jccz, sum(gc) gc, sum(jj) jj, sum(qtbw) qtbw, sum(bzwp) bzwp, sum(qz) qz, sum(qy) qy, sum(jd) jd, sum(dj) dj, sum(qtgj) qtgj, sum(yjqtjz) yjqtjz, sum(hjc) hjc, sum(esyx) esyx, sum(eszss) eszss, sum(syzws) syzws, sum(ssyys) ssyys, sum(wyry) wyry, sum(wlwgry) wlwgry, sum(sfry) sfry, sum(jsbr) jsbr, sum(qtrq) qtrq, sum(zacf) zacf, sum(xscf) xscf, sum(rcwk) rcwk, sum(nvl(sjzy, '0')) sjzy, sum(nvl(lg, '0')) lg, sum(nvl(jdhxp, '0')) jdhxp, sum(nvl(qzb, '0')) qzb, sum(nvl(zdb, '0')) zdb, sum(nvl(qyb, '0')) qyb from t_tjfx_zapctb t where 1=1 and t.tjyf = #[tjyf] and t.leve = '4' and t.djdwdm like case when F_GET_DWLEVE(#[djdwdm]) = '1' then substr(#[djdwdm], 1, 2) || '%' when F_GET_DWLEVE(#[djdwdm]) = '2' then substr(#[djdwdm], 1, 4) || '%' when F_GET_DWLEVE(#[djdwdm]) = '3' then substr(#[djdwdm], 1, 6) || '%' when F_GET_DWLEVE(#[djdwdm]) = '4' then substr(#[djdwdm], 1, 8) || '%' when F_GET_DWLEVE(#[djdwdm]) = '5' then substr(#[djdwdm], 1, 12) || '%' else substr(#[djdwdm], 1, 12) || '%' end

select hja , lljf, zdcq, tqgz, fzcsw, sfss, qtyy, mjpcfx, hlwjh, dhjb, qzjb, hjb, qsydw, dzjg, xx, jccz, gc, jj, qtbw, bzwp, qz, qy, jd, dj, qtgj, yjqtjz, hjc, esyx, eszss, syzws, ssyys, wyry, wlwgry, sfry, jsbr, qtrq, zacf, xscf, rcwk, nvl(sjzy, '0') sjzy, nvl(lg, '0') lg, nvl(jdhxp, '0') jdhxp, nvl(qzb, '0') qzb, nvl(zdb, '0') zdb, nvl(qyb, '0') qyb, djdwdm, djdwmc, tbsj, tjyf from t_tjfx_zapctb t where 1=1 and t.tjyf = #[tjyf] and t.djdwdm like case when F_GET_DWLEVE(#[djdwdm]) = '1' then substr(#[djdwdm], 1, 2) || '%' when F_GET_DWLEVE(#[djdwdm]) = '2' then substr(#[djdwdm], 1, 4) || '%' when F_GET_DWLEVE(#[djdwdm]) = '3' then substr(#[djdwdm], 1, 6) || '%' when F_GET_DWLEVE(#[djdwdm]) = '4' then substr(#[djdwdm], 1, 8) || '%' when F_GET_DWLEVE(#[djdwdm]) = '5' then substr(#[djdwdm], 1, 12) || '%' else substr(#[djdwdm], 1, 12) || '%' end

select hja , lljf, zdcq, tqgz, fzcsw, sfss, qtyy, mjpcfx, hlwjh, dhjb, qzjb, hjb, qsydw, dzjg, xx, jccz, gc, jj, qtbw, bzwp, qz, qy, jd, dj, qtgj, yjqtjz, hjc, esyx, eszss, syzws, ssyys, wyry, wlwgry, sfry, jsbr, qtrq, zacf, xscf, rcwk, nvl(sjzy, '0') sjzy, nvl(lg, '0') lg, nvl(jdhxp, '0') jdhxp, nvl(qzb, '0') qzb, nvl(zdb, '0') zdb, nvl(qyb, '0') qyb, djdwdm, djdwmc, tbsj, tjyf from t_tjfx_zapctb t where 1=1 and t.leve = '4' and t.tjyf = #[tjyf] and t.djdwdm like case when F_GET_DWLEVE(#[djdwdm]) = '1' then substr(#[djdwdm], 1, 2) || '%' when F_GET_DWLEVE(#[djdwdm]) = '2' then substr(#[djdwdm], 1, 4) || '%' when F_GET_DWLEVE(#[djdwdm]) = '3' then substr(#[djdwdm], 1, 6) || '%' when F_GET_DWLEVE(#[djdwdm]) = '4' then substr(#[djdwdm], 1, 8) || '%' when F_GET_DWLEVE(#[djdwdm]) = '5' then substr(#[djdwdm], 1, 12) || '%' else substr(#[djdwdm], 1, 12) || '%' end

select hja , lljf, zdcq, tqgz, fzcsw, sfss, qtyy, mjpcfx, hlwjh, dhjb, qzjb, hjb, qsydw, dzjg, xx, jccz, gc, jj, qtbw, bzwp, qz, qy, jd, dj, qtgj, yjqtjz, hjc, esyx, eszss, syzws, ssyys, wyry, wlwgry, sfry, jsbr, qtrq, zacf, xscf, rcwk, nvl(sjzy, '0') sjzy, nvl(lg, '0') lg, nvl(jdhxp, '0') jdhxp, nvl(qzb, '0') qzb, nvl(zdb, '0') zdb, nvl(qyb, '0') qyb, djdwdm, djdwmc, tbsj, tjyf from t_tjfx_zapctb t where 1=1 and t.tjyf = #[tjyf] and t.djdwdm = #[djdwdm]
